title: dasaratha nandhanA
sahitya:
dasarata nandanA! dasamukha bhanjanA! sashi viDambana vadanA!
asamAna sadAshiva hituDai velasina

anupallavi

rasapUrita shuddha swarasammOdita
pashur vEti shisurvEti vEti vEti sangItapriya

caraNam

mAmadhurAkshara shrI rAma mantra
dhAmuDai nelakonna shrI rAmacandra!
nEmamutO ninnu smariyincitirA!
nAmati karagincu shrI lavAnki rAga rasikanuta
